extendedInfo.description: ==Only for Vivo subscribers==The application VIVO Co-Piloto TrÃ¢nsito transforms your Android in a last generation navigator. Besides the turn-by-turn navigation with voice guidance, you can also take advantage of a real time traffic information service, which is available for the cities of Fortaleza, Recife, BrasÃ­lia, Rio de Janeiro, Belo Horizonte, Grande SÃ£o Paulo, Campinas, Curitiba, Porto Alegre. Vivo Co-Piloto TrÃ¢nsito will calculate alternative routes, which allow you in real time to avoid delays, caused by slower traffic or even accidents. APP DESCRIPTION: â¢VIVO Co-Piloto TrÃ¢nsito weekly R$9,90 price includes 1 month turn-by-turn navigation + Live traffic RESOURCES: â¢Android full integration, quick alternation between applications and native keyboard use â¢routing calculation algorithms more precise and efficient â¢truly intuitive user interface and design â¢alternative route calculation based on real time traffic information â¢based on the NDrive-Navigation Systems software â¢all the resources you need in a personal navigation device Other dynamic features which make our navigation application simple and effective include: â¢3D Building rendering â¢travel assistance â¢adventure mode â¢sharing your route and current location on Facebook and Foursquare â¢searching and checking-in on Foursquare venues â¢advanced search of points of interest with Local Search â¢updated weather forecast for hundreds of Brazilian cities â¢the most recent maps of Brazil provided by Digibase

reviews.title: Lixo - Trash
reviews.comment: Porque este app esta listado como FREE se e so uma versao de prova por 10 dias?????? E ainda por cima ao desinstalar deixa lixo para tras sem apagar!! Depois da desinstalacao nao esquecam de apagar o diretorio sdcard/Co-Piloto. Este troco tinha que ser da Vivo!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uma merda
reviews.comment: Nao deveria ser listado como free,.
reviews.author: Tobias Taurian Viana
